name: TNT Man
description:
• Hero
    - As a true hero has only one life. You can find armor.
    - Carries a small BK grenade.
  • Three types of enemies
    - Rotten: The weakest. Little life. Walking slowly. Constantly haunts.
    - Nagging: The average type. Average survivability. Walks fast. Not often haunts.
    - Tantrum: The ugliest. Beat, beat and beat. Runs. Blindly pursuing.
  • Obstacles
    - Brick: Cracked by bombs. Average strength.
    - Concrete: Cracking from bombs. High strength.
  • Objects
    - Bombs: You can set a timer. The force of the explosion (shock wave).
    - Roof: Destroyed by bombs. There may be bonuses under the roof.
    - Glass: Fragile, transparent.
    - Armor: Makes it possible to survive.
  • Bonuses
    - Acceleration: Acceleration of the player's running.
    - Bombs: Plus grenades.
    - Stop: Everything is in the stop for a while.
